definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie

sentences.english: Among the dead was Laith Misha'an, the leader of the local pro-government Sunni militia.
sentences.chinese: 其中一名遇难者为当地支持政府派逊尼派义勇军领袖。

sentences.english: In Bahrain, the conflict between Sunnis and Shiites is clearly central.
sentences.chinese: 在巴林，逊尼派和什叶派穆斯林的冲突显然是焦点。

sentences.english: The woman eventually attacked members of government-backed Sunni groups in Diyala province, the suspect said.
sentences.chinese: 嫌犯说，老师最后袭击了有政府背景的某逊尼派团体。

sentences.english: The Sunni caliph is the spiritual and political head of the community.
sentences.chinese: 逊尼派哈里发，是精神文明建设和政治领导社会。

sentences.english: He says the Sunni community feels it is not fairly represented in the Shiite-led government.
sentences.chinese: 他说，逊尼派社区感觉由什叶派领导政府并不公平。

sentences.english: So the Sunnis too have quietened their opposition to the US.
sentences.chinese: 因此，逊尼派穆斯林也有转趋淡静，他们反对美国。

sentences.english: The Sunni Arabs not so much.
sentences.chinese: 逊尼派阿拉伯人并非如此。

sentences.english: Which of these countries has approximately 19 million Sunni Muslims?
sentences.chinese: 下列哪个国家有接近一千九百万的逊尼派穆斯林？

sentences.english: The government is led by a Sunni, Prime Minister Fuad Saniora.
sentences.chinese: 黎巴嫩政府由逊尼派总理西尼乌拉为首。

sentences.english: Hussein and his unreconciled supporters among Iraq's Sunni minority, there was an explosion of anger.
sentences.chinese: 侯赛因先生及其逊尼派中不甘心的支持者们怒气爆发。

sentences.english: The team would have to include Shia as well as Sunni members.
sentences.chinese: 这个团队既要有什叶派也要有逊尼派的成员。

sentences.english: The country's Sunni monarch King Hamad made the announcement in a national broadcast.
sentences.chinese: 该国的逊尼派国王哈马德在全国广播中宣部了该决定。

sentences.english: Death-squad killings of Sunnis would rise.
sentences.chinese: 敢死队对逊尼派的杀戮会增加。

sentences.english: The ruling Taliban—mostly fundamentalist Sunni ethnic Pashtuns—saw Hazaras as infidels animals other.
sentences.chinese: 掌权的塔利班绝大多数是原教旨逊尼派和普什图族人。

sentences.english: You said that there was no history of violence between Shia and Sunni.
sentences.chinese: 你说什叶派和逊尼派之间没有暴力冲突的历史。

sentences.english: Arab opinion, even in Sunni nations, is sympathetic to Iran.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯舆论，甚至在逊尼派国家，同情伊朗。

definition: the Copts, major ethnoreligious group of Egyptian Christians
